content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Right now, reading this module, you are most likely on the bench. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Bench\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a period when you work but do not have a sufficient project workload. Bench refers to the period when an employee's planned workload on the project(s) takes less than 50% of the employee's available time. For example, when a project needs 0-20 hours a week out of 40 hours available.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Most often, employees go to the bench at the very beginning of their work at the company, as well as when changing projects if a new project is not found before the end of work on the previous one.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For obvious reasons, the company tries to minimize the time employees spend on the bench, but since this is an inevitable part of the job, it is better to understand what you can do while on the bench.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":50249,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b86108d9-019a-46c6-8461-b6c2207ac1a9/cran_character_12 - Welcome to MSTD.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b86108d9-019a-46c6-8461-b6c2207ac1a9/cran_character_12 - Welcome to MSTD.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"cran_character_12 - Welcome to MSTD.png\",\"name\":\"cran_character_12 - Welcome to MSTD.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"b86108d9-019a-46c6-8461-b6c2207ac1a9\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":363,\"height\":363},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\nThere are plenty of activities you can spend your time on. Here are some of the most important:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Preparation for a new project.\\n\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You will have a new project soon, and part of the standard project selection process is project interviews. Take time to prepare for the interview, which includes updating your profile, as well as preparing to answer questions about your experience, capabilities, skills, and specific technologies and programming languages. Having prepared appropriately, it will be much easier for you to go through all the stages of the interviews, and it will also allow you to feel much more confident at the interview.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Profile update.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\nThe company has a resume template that is convenient for showing our clients. It is generated automatically based on data from \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"UPSA\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". The main information that will be used when generating a profile is data from the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Skills\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Past Projects\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Training Courses\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", and \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Education\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Skills\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Past Projects\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" tabs should be given special attention because they are the most subject to change in the course of your work and contain fundamental information for a profile. A full description of your experience in the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Past Projects\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" tab will provide sufficient insight when considering you for a particular position. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMBDSKCV/UPSA+Profile+Update+Guideline+for+Employees\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Here\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" you can find detailed instructions on how to approach completing your UPSA profile.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Deepening your knowledge.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\nBench is a great opportunity to freshen up your existing knowledge and learn something new. What exactly to study is up to you. If you aren’t sure what to take on, then you can always go to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/start\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Learn\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and find something you like or consult with your resource manager. For example, knowledge of cloud services and technologies will definitely be useful!\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Almost everyone spends time on the bench at some point. Knowing how to make the most of this period will help not to waste your time and reduce feelings of anxiety and uncertainty. You can also always contact your resource manager or HR in case of any questions – they will help.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"More information:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMWPM/Bench+Program\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Bench Program\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMWPM/How+to+spend+my+bench+time\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"How to spend my bench time\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMBDSKCV/UPSA+Profile+Update+Guideline+for+Employees\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"UPSA Profile Update Guideline for Employees\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}}"
